repository.name: dffml
repository.description: The easiest way to use Machine Learning. Mix and match underlying ML libraries and data set sources. Generate new datasets or modify existing ones with ease.

rename.from: feature: Move from class based approach to instance based

body: @pdxjohnny, I am working on this issue.

Essentially, we want to remove this code:

https://github.com/intel/dffml/blob/4c1e7870dba12c298d5a7f4740a23af634cacb7e/dffml/feature/feature.py#L160-L187

And replace

https://github.com/intel/dffml/blob/4c1e7870dba12c298d5a7f4740a23af634cacb7e/dffml/feature/feature.py#L19

With

```python
@dataclasses.dataclass
class Feature:
    name: str
    dtype: Type # from typing import Type
    length: Union[int, List[int]]

    # ... All the existing methods in feature (but not dtype and length)
```

We'll also go through and remove all references to `DefFeature` and replace them with `Feature`

Right now to create a new `Feature` you have to make a whole new `class`. What we're trying to do here is have `Feature` be a class. And have features be instances of that class. Rather than other classes which are subclasses of `Feature`.

issue.title: cleanup: features: Remove Features class

repository.name: dffml
repository.description: The easiest way to use Machine Learning. Mix and match underlying ML libraries and data set sources. Generate new datasets or modify existing ones with ease.

issue.body:
After #303 we'll want to look at removing the Features class. There's probably
going to be a lot of changes inovled in this.

We probably want to make sure #569 is done first. (We'll go from Features ->
List[Feature])

issue.title: WIP: Transforming features from subclass to instance of Feature class

repository.name: dffml
repository.description: The easiest way to use Machine Learning. Mix and match underlying ML libraries and data set sources. Generate new datasets or modify existing ones with ease.

issue.body:
Closes #303 

This pull request is possibly more than 1000 lines because it was not possible to split into smaller tasks. Either all changes should be placed or none. 

Here are the changes:
- Removed DefFeature class
- Added constructor (`__init__`) to the Feature class.
- Feature class does not inherit from Entrypoint Class.
- Removed load function from Feature class.
- Access to `dtype`  and `length` will be through attributes rather than methods.
- Modified all tests that were based on the subclass of Feature class.
